quizDescription: Enjoy some fun and trivia questions with this quiz!

questions.question: Which planet in our solar system is known as the 'Red Planet'?
questions.explanation: Mars is often referred to as the 'Red Planet' due to its reddish appearance caused by iron oxide (rust) on its surface.

questions.question: What is the largest mammal on Earth?
questions.explanation: The blue whale is the largest mammal on Earth, and it is also the largest animal ever known to have existed on our planet.

questions.question: Which famous fictional wizard attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
questions.explanation: Harry Potter, the titular character of the popular book and film series, attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

questions.question: What is the main ingredient in traditional Japanese miso soup?
questions.explanation: The main ingredient in traditional Japanese miso soup is miso paste, a fermented soybean paste.

questions.question: Which iconic video game character is known for eating dots while being chased by ghosts?
questions.explanation: Pac-Man is the iconic video game character known for eating dots while being chased by ghosts in the classic arcade game.

questions.question: What is the highest-grossing film of all time (as of my last knowledge update in September 2021)?
questions.explanation: As of September 2021, 'Avatar' was the highest-grossing film of all time, directed by James Cameron.

questions.question: Which element is represented by the chemical symbol 'H' on the periodic table?
questions.explanation: The chemical symbol 'H' on the periodic table represents the element hydrogen, the lightest and most abundant element in the universe.

questions.question: What is the largest planet in our solar system?
questions.explanation: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system, known for its immense size and colorful bands of clouds.

questions.question: What is the capital city of Australia?
questions.explanation: The capital city of Australia is Canberra, where the Australian government is located.

questions.question: What is the tallest mountain in the world?
questions.explanation: Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world, located in the Himalayas on the border between Nepal and China.
